Description: Ensures that each customer_id in tsb.customer_data_bank is unique and not duplicated, maintaining entity integrity.
Custom_SQL: SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks that all rows have a non-null customer_id, as required by the PRIMARY KEY constraint.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_id IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where full_name is missing, which may impact customer identification and downstream processes.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE full_name IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where date_of_birth is missing, which may affect age calculations and compliance checks.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where gender is missing, which may impact demographic analysis.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where address is missing, which may impact customer communication and verification.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE address IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where phone_number is missing, which may hinder customer contactability.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where email_address is missing, which may impact digital communication and notifications.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where national_id_or_passport_number is missing, which may affect identity verification.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where occupation is missing, which may impact customer profiling and segmentation.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE occupation IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where customer_type is missing, which may affect customer classification and reporting.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_type IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where account_numbers is missing, which may impact account linkage and reconciliation.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE account_numbers IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where age is missing, which may impact age-based analytics and compliance.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where created_by is missing, which may impact audit trails and data provenance.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_by IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where created_on is missing, which may impact audit trails and record tracking.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where modified_by is missing, which may impact audit trails and change tracking.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_by IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where modified_on is missing, which may impact audit trails and change tracking.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_on IS NULL

Description: Identifies records where status is missing, which may impact customer lifecycle management and reporting.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NULL

Description: Checks for records where age is not a valid integer or is negative, which may indicate data entry errors.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NOT NULL AND (age < 0 OR age::text !~ '^\d+$')

Description: Checks for records where date_of_birth is not a valid date, which may indicate data entry errors.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth IS NOT NULL AND date_of_birth::text !~ '^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}$'

Description: Checks for records where email_address does not match a basic email pattern, which may impact communication.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL AND email_address !~* '^[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\.[A-Za-z]{2,}$'

Description: Checks for records where phone_number contains invalid characters, which may impact contactability.
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND phone_number !~ '^[0-9+\-\(\) ]+$'

Description: Checks for records where gender values are outside expected domain (e.g., Male, Female, Other).
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NOT NULL AND gender NOT IN ('Male','Female','Other')

Description: Checks for records where status values are outside expected domain (e.g., Active, Inactive, Suspended).
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NOT NULL AND status NOT IN ('Active','Inactive','Suspended')

Description: Checks for duplicate national_id_or_passport_number values, which may indicate identity conflicts.
Custom_SQL: SELECT national_id_or_passport_number, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NOT NULL GROUP BY national_id_or_passport_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks for duplicate email_address values, which may indicate multiple records for the same customer.
Custom_SQL: SELECT email_address, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL GROUP BY email_address HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks for logical inconsistencies between age and date_of_birth values.
Custom_SQL: SELECT customer_id, age, date_of_birth FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NOT NULL AND date_of_birth IS NOT NULL AND age <> EXTRACT(YEAR FROM AGE(date_of_birth))

Description: Checks for records where created_on is after modified_on, which may indicate data entry errors.
Custom_SQL: SELECT customer_id, created_on, modified_on FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NOT NULL AND modified_on IS NOT NULL AND created_on > modified_on
